message: When I come to, I'm still in that white hall.
Toue and those guards are gone.
Did the guard's song... make me relive my past?
My past...

I'd forgotten it for so long, but back then, I...
I did some pretty unforgivable things.

...Huh?
Someone has me by the arm.
...Mink. It must be him who took my hand.
I turn to look at him, secretly grateful for his presence. It kept me from losing sight of myself.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you alright? That song..."
A feeling of dread overcomes me the moment I open my mouth.
Mink's massive body suddenly jerks. The next thing I know, he's on his hands and knees.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, what's wrong?!"
I look into his face and am shocked by what I see.
Sweat is dripping down his cheeks and off his chin. He's panting.
I've never seen Mink like this before. I shake his shoulders gently.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, you okay? Mink!"
He doesn't respond. Can't he hear me?
His eyes are open, but he isn't seeing anything.
We've come so far, and been through so much...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where do you get off giving up before me?! This wasn't part of the deal!"
Despite all the beatings and awful things he did...
And the fact that he dragged me out here just to use me...
There's no denying that I find his ruthlessness and force of will... captivating.
In the beginning, I only followed him because we shared the same goal. But now...
Now I want to know what drives him. Not what his objective is, exactly, but how he can be so strong.
I want to see where his cold, hard gaze will lead.
Just now, Mink pulled me back from the brink
I want to return the favor.
There's only one way I can.
...Scrap.
There's no guarantee I'll be able to save him. I might even "destroy" him.
But there is a chance.
I grab Mink by the chin and gently tilt his face up.
His dilated pupils look as deep and black as the ocean at night.
I gaze into his eyes, searching for any sign of him in their depths, and speak in a low, soft tone.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Mink, can you hear me? I'm gonna go inside you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Look into my eyes... Good, just like that. Now let me in."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let me in... deep inside. Take me there."
